articles.description: With the Eels’ dream streak still in tact and after the Roosters’ sleek performances over the last two weeks, Saturday’s clash between the two is shaping up to be the match of the season thus far.
articles.content:
A lot is at stake for Parramatta. If they win theyll remain the only undefeated team in the competition and will break the clubs record for the best ever start to a season.
